name: Salt Flats
role_in_state: Primary salt supplier and reagent source for fleet provisioning
economy_niches: Large-scale salt pans and evaporation works
Harvesting brine minerals and halophyte-derived ritual reagents
Seasonal salt caravan staging and overland re-export
Provision labor pool for coastal fleets
culture_adjustments: Labor-caste organization around saltworks with distinct saltkeeper tattoos
Lower prevalence of Island Creole; Coastal Tongues dominant with local cant
Heightened contractualism and oath-rituals tied to salt distribution
Practical austerity: less ceremonial display, more preservation lore
constraints: Ritual magic relies on scarce imported reagents; local production limited
Severely limited freshwater; agriculture and timber scarce
State monopoly and fortification restrict private expansion
notes: Seasonal access: flats traversable primarily in dry season
Evaporation works are heavily state-regulated and militarized
